App.Title: Irony Mod Manager: v{AppVersion}
App.BackgroundOperationMessage: Please wait a background operation is being performed. App will shut down once it is completed...
App.WaitBackgroundOperationMessage: Please wait a background operation is being performed.

JokeError.Title: Unhandled egg-container memory violation
JokeError.Message: Press OK to pretend like nothing happened :)

FatalError.Message: Unhandled error occurred. App will close automatically.
FatalError.MessageWithLastError: Unhandled error occurred. Please use this information to file a bug report:{NewLine}{NewLine}{Message}
FatalError.Title: Error

SavingError.Title: Save Error
SavingError.Message: Something seems to be locking Irony's ability to write to mod files. Please report this on GitHub issue tracker and post the error log.

UnableToWriteError.Title: Application Blocked
UnableToWriteError.Message: The application appears to be blocked by Antivirus or permissions and is unable to write to the user documents directory:{NewLine}{Paths}

InvalidModsDetected.Title: Invalid Mods Detected
InvalidModsDetected.Message: The following mod locations could not be parsed due to either invalid archives or locked files:{NewLine}{Mods}

Themes.Name: Theme
Themes.Restart_Message: App needs to be restarted in order for the new theme to properly apply. Do you want to restart the app?

Installed_Mods.Name: Installed Mods
Installed_Mods.LoadingMods: Please wait while loading mod data...
Installed_Mods.RefreshingModList: Please wait while the mod list is being refreshed...

InvalidMods.Message: The following mods are missing:{NewLine}{Mods}.{NewLine}{NewLine}Do you want to delete the descriptors?

Collection_Mods.Overlay_Duplicate_Message: Please wait while performing duplicate operation...

DeleteMerge.DeleteMessage: Existence of merged mod has been detected, do you want to delete it as well?

ImportFromClipboard.PromptMessage: This will overwrite your mod collection mod order and mod selection. Proceed?

ImportPrompt.Message: Collection already exists and will be overwritten, do you want to proceed?

ImportNonExistingMods.Title: Non existant mods
ImportNonExistingMods.Message: The following mods could not be imported as they appear to be missing:{NewLine}{Mods}

Basic.Overlay_Gathering_Mod_Info: Please wait while gathering mod info...
Basic.Overlay_Writing_Files: Please wait while merging the mod collection...

Compress.Overlay_Gathering_Mod_Info: Please wait while gathering mod info...
Compress.Overlay_Compressing_Files: Please wait while merging the mod collection...

OverwritePrompt.Title: Overwrite existing collection?
OverwritePrompt.Message: A merged collection with the specified name already exists. Would you like to overwrite it?

DeletePrompt.Title: Confirm Delete
DeletePrompt.Message: Are you sure you want to delete the patch mod?

Prompts.ModsMissingMessage: Some mods are missing and have been removed from the collection automatically:{NewLine}{NewLine}{Mods}

Mod_Actions.Overlay_Apply_Message: Please wait while applying mod collection...

ConflictSolver.Overlay_Conflict_Solver_Indexing_Game: Please wait while indexing game definitions...
ConflictSolver.Overlay_Conflict_Solver_Loading_Game_Def: Please wait while loading game definitions...
ConflictSolver.Overlay_Conflict_Solver_Loading_Definiti: Please wait while loading mod definitions...
ConflictSolver.Overlay_Conflict_Solver_Analyzing_Confli: Please wait while analyzing definitions for conflicts...
ConflictSolver.Overlay_Conflict_Solver_Analyzing_Resolv: Please wait while analyzing resolved definitions...

FirstUsePrompt.Title: Attention
FirstUsePrompt.Message: The conflict solver is not for the faint of heart. It requires knowledge of, and experience with patching code. Users of small mod collections should ignore it, users of larger mod collections should consider either trimming their mod collections or researching code patching. Support cannot be provided should you proceed.

GameExecutableNotSetPrompt.Title: Game Executable Not Set
GameExecutableNotSetPrompt.Message: Game executable has not been set in the options. This mod collection previously included game files in its analysis. Conflict solver will not be able to analyze game files and some resolutions might be reset. Do you wish to proceed?

TooLargePrompt.Title: Too Large
TooLargePrompt.Message: A mod with large source code has been detected this will potentially cause an out of memory crash in Irony. Game will potentially be also unlikely to be able to handle such large source files.

NotSet.Title: Game Not Set
NotSet.Message: Game was not automatically detected, please use the options window to manually set the executable path.

InvalidConflicts.Name: Invalid
InvalidConflicts.Error: Error at line: {Line} column: {Column} file: {File}.{NewLine}Please report this error to the author of the mod: {ModName}.{NewLine}{NewLine}Error message says:{NewLine}{NewLine}{Message}
InvalidConflicts.ErrorNoLine: Error at file: {File}.{NewLine}Please report this error to the author of the mod: {ModName}.{NewLine}{NewLine}Error message says:{NewLine}{NewLine}{Message}

EditorResources.SearchToggleReplace: Toggle between find and replace modes

Editor.Title: External Merge
Editor.Message: Press confirm once you are satisfied with external merge.

ReadonlyEditor.Title: External Compare
ReadonlyEditor.Message: Press OK once you are done comparing.

ResolutionSaveError.Title: Virtual Definition Validation Failed
ResolutionSaveError.MessageLine: The virtual definition could not be used to resolve the conflict. The virtual definition failed validation.{NewLine}{NewLine}{ErrorMessage}{NewLine}Error at line: {Line} column: {Column}
ResolutionSaveError.MessageNoLine: The virtual definition could not be used to resolve the conflict. The virtual definition failed validation.{NewLine}{NewLine}{ErrorMessage}

BracketMismatchError.Message: Bracket Count Mismatch! Open Bracket: {OpenBracketCount} Close Bracket: {CloseBracketCount}

ResetWarning.Title: Conflicts Reset
ResetWarning.AnalyzeModeAll: Some conflicts will be reset if Conflict Solver is run due to mod changes. These are resolved conflicts which will be reset:{NewLine}{NewLine}{ListOfConflictsResolved}{NewLine}These are ignored conflicts which will be reset:{NewLine}{NewLine}{ListOfConflictsIgnored}
ResetWarning.AnalyzeModeResolvedOnly: Some conflicts will be reset if Conflict Solver is run due to mod changes. These are resolved conflicts which will be reset:{NewLine}{NewLine}{ListOfConflictsResolved}
ResetWarning.AnalyzeModeIgnoredOnly: Some conflicts will be reset if Conflict Solver is run due to mod changes. These are ignored conflicts which will be reset:{NewLine}{NewLine}{ListOfConflictsIgnored}
ResetWarning.RegularModeAll: Some conflicts were reset due to mod changes. These were reset resolved conflicts:{NewLine}{NewLine}{ListOfConflictsResolved}{NewLine}These were reset ignored conflicts:{NewLine}{NewLine}{ListOfConflictsIgnored}
ResetWarning.RegularModeResolvedOnly: Some conflicts were reset due to mod changes. These were reset resolved conflicts:{NewLine}{NewLine}{ListOfConflictsResolved}
ResetWarning.RegularModeIgnoredOnly: Some conflicts were reset due to mod changes. These were reset ignored conflicts:{NewLine}{NewLine}{ListOfConflictsIgnored}

ConflictIgnore.Watermark: Use # for comments. New line is a new rule.

Editor.TestRight: faucibus purus in massa tempor nec feugiat nisl pretium fusce

Overlay.UpdateInstalling: Unpacking updates and preparing to run installer...

Errors.DownloadErrorMessage: Error occurred while downloading updates, please see error log for more details.

AutoUpdatePrompts.Title: Automatically Check For Updates
AutoUpdatePrompts.Message: Irony would like your permission to check for updates at startup. Would you like Irony to notify you of updates automatically?

UpdateNotification.Title: Update Detected
UpdateNotification.Message: Check the options screen for update details or click on this message.

CustomModDirectory.Title: Not Empty
CustomModDirectory.Message: Custom mod directory is not empty if you change it now you may lose some mods. Are you sure you want to change it?

CollectionAndModDeleted.Title: Collection and Merged Mods Deleted
CollectionAndModDeleted.Message: {CollectionName} and merged mods have been deleted.

NewDescriptorsChecked.Title: New Mods Checked
NewDescriptorsChecked.Message: Check for new mods is complete.

ConflictSolverUpdate.Title: Conflict Solver Updates
ConflictSolverUpdate.Message: Load order or some mods have been updated. In case of no conflicts just navigate back. Some automatic fixes are applied.

NoUpdatesAvailable.Title: No Updates
NoUpdatesAvailable.Message: There seem to be no updates available.

ReportValid.Title: File Hash Match
ReportValid.Message: All file hashes seem to match.

CustomPatchRerunConflictSolver.Title: Conflict Solver Refresh
CustomPatchRerunConflictSolver.Message: Conflict Solver needs to be refreshed to take into account new custom patches added. Please rerun conflict solver.

CollectionMergeNotEnoughSpace.Title: Not enough free space
CollectionMergeNotEnoughSpace.Message: There is not enough free space to perform merge operation.

ParadoxLauncherRunning.Title: Paradox Launcher Active
ParadoxLauncherRunning.Message: Paradox Launcher is running, please close it before attempting this action.

ConflictSolverRerunGlobalVars.Title: Conflict Solver Refresh
ConflictSolverRerunGlobalVars.Message: Conflict Solver needs to be refreshed to take into account new global variable patches added. Please rerun conflict solver.
